case.name: No panties
case.description: Raven removes her leotard with a bra underneat, but no panties, leaving her bottomless.

trigger.state: S-so I don't wear panties! Is that a problem?
No, I don't wear panties under my leotard... Try not to stare too much...
Not wearing panties was probably a bad decision. I guess we'll see...
Eh, Starfire barges into my room in worse situations. I've almost gotten used to it. Almost...
